Document.Title: Dr. Sebi: Recommended Teas, Spices, Seeds and Nuts (Butters)

Content:
>>>Herbal Teas:
Allspice
Anise
Chamomile
Cloves
Fennel
Ginger
Lemon grass
Raspberry

>>>Mild Flavors
Basil
Bay leaf
Cilantro
Dill
Marjoram
Oregano
Savory
Sweet Basil
Tarragon
Thyme

>>>Pungent & Spicy Flavors
Achiote
Cayenne
Cumin
Coriander
Onion Powder
Sage

>>>Salty Flavors
Pure Sea Salt
Powdered Granulated Seaweed
(Kelp/Dulce/Nori – has “sea taste”)

>>>Sweet Flavors
100% Pure Maple Syrup – Grade B recommended
Maple “Sugar” (from dried maple syrup)
Date “Sugar” (from dried dates)
100% Pure Agave Syrup – (from cactus)

>>>Nuts, Seeds (Butters)
Raw Almonds and Almond butter
Raw Sesame Seeds
Raw Sesame “Tahini” Butter
Walnuts
